overview: The art of darkness. The art of domination. The art of deception...  From these elements the beautiful Shelby Stevens and her alluring slave Brittany Andrews weave a web to trap lovely, innocent Asia Carrera. Unjustly imprisoned, Asia is first subjected to perverse punishments and pleasures at the hands of the devious Brittany. Once released, her troubling memories drive her into the clutches of the diabolical Dr. Stevens, whose examination techniques expose the true heart of Asia’s submissive compulsions. Then it’s Brittany’s turn to be “Rewarded” by her mistress for her success in recruiting Asia into Shelby’s harem of slaves.
title: The Art of Deception
